content.description: Start right hand on a crimp and left hand on a good edge, with good feet below. Pull on and cross right hand to the undercling hold (what you rose to in Multiverse) and then go straight out to the jug out left. Match up on the jug/the tufa above it and then finish by moving up and slightly left to a jug at the lip through a series of crimps. Serveral betas work for the crimp portion at the end of this climb. This climb is essentially a variation of Multiverse that completely skips the start sequence of that climb.
content.protection: 1-2 pads, the finish is very dabby.
content.location: Walk out of Pond Cave, exiting on the side of Who Needs Hueco, meet up with the trail that traces back up around the pond, the Chromatic Ribbon Boulder will be right off the trail on the right, on a raised rock platform. Universe starts under the small roof, moving out left and linking into Multiverse.

content.description: Stand start to Grade Inflation V10. Start standing, hands matched on sharp crimp above head height (may need to stack pads if short) and throw to lip. Tricky top out, more holds could possibly be revealed to make it easier if the top is cleaned up a little more. Crack/ledge to the right is off. #2 in photo.
Sit start at the base of the small crack, lay back the crack and move up and right to a good shelf at about head height. From here bring your feet up and top out straight up as for Futurama.
content.location: In the back of the small cave making up the Chromatic Ribbon boulder, it is to the right of the start of Grade Inflation/Multiverse

content.description: Start sitting matched on small crimp rail on the right, move left hand to decent crimp then hard right hand rose move (crux) to small, sharp undercling hold. Unwind and grab large jug on lower arete, try hard to keep yourself from dragging on the ground, and continue up small crimps to top out. Very fun opening section, definitely gets a little squeeze-y through the second half. Would love more opinions on the grade.
Start as for Multiverse and link into Spacecast to top out.
Sit start matched in the lowest crack on the right wall of the boulder, move straight up through good crimps/edges to a jug shelf at about head height. Hike the feet up and top out straight up.
content.location: To the right of Grade Inflation/Multiverse, starting low in the middle of the right wall of the Chromatic Ribbon boulder.

content.description: Stand start on the arete (with the large block behind you), pull on get low feet and then bump right up the arete to good edges on the face. Once you have a better right hand, bring up the right foot up the arete and then you can reach up to good holds higher on the face/left arete. Top out straight up the face on a good shelf at the lip.
content.protection: 2 pads, good to have one for the block behind you.
content.location: On the lower half of this boulder, the left arete just next to the block you have to get up onto to access the rest of the climbs.

content.description: Sit start at the base of the arete, work up the arete to the lip of the boulder, and then traverse tot he left arete before topping out same as for DooP.
content.location: Right arete of the front of the Chromatic Ribbon boulder, before you step up onto the block for the rest of the climbs (other than DooP).

content.description: Small boulder with a couple of interesting problems. Seems to be potential for some other hard lines.
